    Blending options.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlendingOptions

        public BlendingOptions()
        Constructor.
        The default source factor is GLES20.GL_SRC_ALPHA.
        The default destination factor is GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA.
        The default blending equation is GLES20.GL_FUNC_ADD.
        See Also:
        GLES20.glBlendFunc(int, int), GLES20.glBlendEquation(int)

      • BlendingOptions

        public BlendingOptions(int sourceFactor,
               int destinationFactor)
        Constructor.
        Supported values for source factor and destination factor:
        GLES20.GL_ZERO, GLES20.GL_ONE, GLES20.GL_SRC_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR , GLES20.GL_DST_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR, GLES20.GL_SRC_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_DST_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_CONSTANT_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_COLOR, GLES20.GL_CONSTANT_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_SRC_ALPHA_SATURATE

        The default blending equation is GLES20.GL_FUNC_ADD
        Parameters:
        sourceFactor - Source factor.
        destinationFactor - Destination factor.
        See Also:
        GLES20.glBlendFunc(int, int), GLES20.glBlendEquation(int)

      • BlendingOptions

        public BlendingOptions(int sourceFactor,
               int destinationFactor,
               int blendEquationMode)
        Constructor.
        Supported values for source factor and destination factor:
        GLES20.GL_ZERO, GLES20.GL_ONE, GLES20.GL_SRC_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR , GLES20.GL_DST_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR, GLES20.GL_SRC_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_DST_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_CONSTANT_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_COLOR, GLES20.GL_CONSTANT_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_SRC_ALPHA_SATURATE

        Supported values for the blending equation:
        GLES20.GL_FUNC_ADD, GLES20.GL_FUNC_SUBTRACT, GLES20.GL_FUNC_REVERSE_SUBTRACT.
        Parameters:
        sourceFactor - Source factor.
        destinationFactor - Destination factor.
        blendEquationMode - Blending equation. This setting will only work in Android Ice Cream Sandwich or newer versions.
        See Also:
        GLES20.glBlendFunc(int, int), GLES20.glBlendEquation(int)

      • getSourceFactor

        public int getSourceFactor()
        Returns the source factor of the blending function.
        Returns:
        source factor
        See Also:

      • setSourceFactor

        public void setSourceFactor(int sourceFactor)
        Sets the source factor of the blending function.
        Supported values for source factor:
        GLES20.GL_ZERO, GLES20.GL_ONE, GLES20.GL_SRC_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR , GLES20.GL_DST_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR, GLES20.GL_SRC_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_DST_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_CONSTANT_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_COLOR, GLES20.GL_CONSTANT_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_SRC_ALPHA_SATURATE
        Parameters:
        sourceFactor - Source factor.
        See Also:
        GLES20.glBlendFunc(int, int)

      • setDestinationFactor

        public void setDestinationFactor(int destinationFactor)
        Sets the destination factor of the blending function.
        Supported values for source factor:
        GLES20.GL_ZERO, GLES20.GL_ONE, GLES20.GL_SRC_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR , GLES20.GL_DST_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR, GLES20.GL_SRC_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_DST_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_CONSTANT_COLOR, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_COLOR, GLES20.GL_CONSTANT_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_ALPHA, GLES20.GL_SRC_ALPHA_SATURATE
        Parameters:
        destinationFactor - Destination factor.
        See Also:
        GLES20.glBlendFunc(int, int)

      • getBlendEquationMode

        public int getBlendEquationMode()
        Returns the blending equation. This setting will only work in Android Ice Cream Sandwich or newer versions.
        Returns:
        GLES20.GL_FUNC_ADD, GLES20.GL_FUNC_SUBTRACT o GLES20.GL_FUNC_REVERSE_SUBTRACT
        See Also:
        GLES20.glBlendEquation(int)

      • setBlendEquationMode

        public void setBlendEquationMode(int blendEquationMode)
        Sets the blending equation. This setting will only work in Android Ice Cream Sandwich or newer versions.
        Parameters:
        blendEquationMode - GLES20.GL_FUNC_ADD, GLES20.GL_FUNC_SUBTRACT or GLES20.GL_FUNC_REVERSE_SUBTRACT
        See Also:
        GLES20.glBlendEquation(int)
